attributes.action: Disable all Premium Rate Telephone Numbers, In Particular Quizz Games On T.V!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the disablement of the Television channels Premium Rate Competition Lines as they are unfair in that they are almost impossible to get through on, thus creating gastronomical telephone bills.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
